title: Scottish election 2021: Leaders to take part in final debate of campaign
content:
1. Scottish election 2021: Leaders to take part in final debate of campaign  BBC News
  2. Nicola Sturgeon’s Quest for Scottish Independence  The New Yorker
  3. Explainer: Scotland's difficult route to another independence referendum  Reuters
  4. Scottish Election 2021: After Covid crisis, voters should be able to choose between a bright future as an independent country or Tory austerity in UK – Nicola Sturgeon  The Scotsman
  5. Take the issue of independence out of Scotland’s election and the SNP would be struggling  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
